item.title: Vscode
item.description: VSCode 用户代码片段 Golang { "main": { "prefix": "main", "body": [ "func main() {", "\t$0", "}" ], "description": "func main() {}" }, "init": { "prefix": "init", "body": [ "func init() {", "\t$0", "}" ], "description": "func init() {}" }, "for range": { "prefix": "forr", "body": [ "for ${1:i},${2:v} := range $3 {", "\t$0", "}" ], "description": "for range" }, "for index" : { "prefix": "fori", "body": [ "for ${1:i}:=${2:0};${1:i}${3:<}${4:n};${1:i}${5:++} {", "\t$0", "}" ], "description": "for index" }, "if err := xxx();err !
